definition: (pathology) an elevation of the skin filled with serous fluid, to get blistered
details:
noun
- (pathology) an elevation of the skin filled with serous fluid
= synonyms: bulla
- (botany) a swelling on a plant similar to that on the skin
- a flaw on a surface resulting when an applied substance does not adhere, as an air bubble in a coat of paint
= example: a flaw on a surface resulting when an applied substance does not adhere, as an air bubble in a coat of paint
verb
- to get blistered
= example: to get blistered
- to cause blisters to form on
= example: to cause blisters to form on
- to subject to harsh criticism
= example: to subject to harsh criticism
= synonyms: whip
